SEARCH
Package com.groq.sdk.models.audio

Class SpeechRequest

java.lang.Object
com.groq.sdk.models.audio.SpeechRequest
public class SpeechRequest extends Object
Represents a request for text-to-speech conversion. Contains the input text, voice selection, and audio output parameters.

Supported voices:

  • alloy
  • echo
  • fable
  • onyx
  • nova
  • shimmer
Since:
06-Sep-2025
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Mr. XYZ
